website_summaries.verdict: Sharp images in a 2-camera system designed for indoor use.
pros: Includes the ability to record internally
Gives you the ability to talk to people you see on the camera through your smartphone
You can adjust the sensitivity to motion and sound
cons: The technical support from the company and responsiveness from customer service is sometimes not the best

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. Good app. Be patient, it will take little bit to learn the app. Everything else is perfect. Good customer service. Using this camera to record my parking lot after someone scratched my car. It does the job very well. Good for indoor recording.
customer_reviews.author: Vasyl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We love the security cameras. My husband and I have 4 and we have purchased a few for family members The best security cameras. Very easy to install. And it’s great that you can view all on your phone or iPad
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lindert

customer_reviews.title: The camera is great!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The camera does everything I need it to do I love the set but I had a disconnect issue so had to call tech support they were very helpful and very nice to work with the tech name was Neal Roberts very knowledgeable and very professional he was great to work with thank you amcrest and amazon!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TonyG

customer_reviews.title: works but have some issues
customer_reviews.text: we use them for the keeping an eye on the dogs. little disappointed in limited down rotation but maybe if we used the wall mounts that would solve the problem. the night vision feature doesn't work for seeing the dogs in rooms without light. lighted room have been really clear through the camera and the zoom in has good quality. the microphone sometimes doesn't work when we've tested it but usually comes on eventually cause the dogs do hear us after few tries. haven't tried any recording so can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: MikeC

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: I now have 23 of these cameras running wifi. No problems with any at this time. Tech service is awesome. Carlos Baletta was very patient and walked me thru setting my cameras up completely. I now can do them as fast as he could. Excellent picture, great playback. A must if you want a great camera system!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alexa does not work unless you have them hooked up to Acrest Cloud service
customer_reviews.text: Alexa does not work unless you have them hooked up to Amcrest Cloud service at a price, wish this would have been stated on Amazons web description.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product - can't beat the quality of image (including ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product - can't beat the quality of image (including night vision) and sound for the price. Bought it first to watch my daughter sleep while I'm on business travel and then went ahead and bought two more. Installing by yourself is a bit challenging though I'm quite tech-savvy but customer support is amazing. Just got off the phone with Cliff Hoyer from Tech Support and he took control of the set up remotely (through TeamViewer) and had it all done in no time. Cameras working now like a charm. Bottomline - great product and super customer support, shout out to Cliff!
customer_reviews.author: Yojyck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent custumer service and product too
customer_reviews.text: Not only it is a great product for the money ,but customer service is extremely cordial and helpful. I just called customer service and spoke to Dominick Parker. I had been trying to connect my cameras to my computer for remote viewing of a vacation home with out any successes but after explinaing to him what l was trying to do l was watching my property in less than 3 minutes . Thank you very much for your help and keep up the excellent customer service job you are doing ty
customer_reviews.author: humberto

customer_reviews.title: Great security camera
customer_reviews.text: Very please with the product. Very easy to install, the app works great. Very quick response time with the camera when turn on the app. I bought cameras from Panasonic few months ago and had to buy these due to very slow response time from the cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built, lots of features, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Well built, great image quality, and the iPhone app is surprisingly robust. I liked the first one I bought so much, I bought two more. Works great even over cellular LTE connections. 4G was a bit choppy but that's a data problem, not the device. If you need a camera that you can control remotely, including repoint, capturing images, or recording video, this is a great choice. Through the app you can also turn on two-way audio to talk and listen remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Coon

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: For the reasonable price these security cameras are great. You get a lot of technology packed into a nice looking camera. I have had these for almost two years now and have been completely satisfied with them. Their customer support is excellent. Today Jared assisted me getting set up with a new smart phone I purchased recently. Helpful, knowledgeable and friendly. This is twice I used their customer technology help. Both times were a good experience! Additional review info...purchased this two pack Amcrest security camera system in 2016. Exchanged a wifi router so needed customer service to assist setup again. Joel from Amcrest assisted with the setup. He was friendly and helpful walking me through the process. Thanks Joel!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Great video & feature rich - great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These were a present surprise. Don't get me wrong I did my homework looking for new cameras to replace my internal home security cams. Easy to install fairly easy to navigate via tools. Expensive to subscribe to their cloud but enough ways around all of that (NVR and lees expensive cloud storage). The video and speed is very good I have 4 of these at all entrances and one for the upstairs. Feature rich(many options) I have to give these guys a 5. The company was picked for their price and speed to deliver and was very satisfied in both areas. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Helt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Arthur was a huge help with setting up all 3 of my Amcrest camers! I now have 3 camera's helping to protect my family and property. The model 721 is over 2 years old and I decided to purchase a 2pack of the white IP2M-841 1080p cameras. I'm really happy with the great tech.service with Amcrest and the product. I am waiting for a PTZ Outdoor Amcrest camera to restock, that will be my 4th. Thank you Amazon and Amcrest!
customer_reviews.author: D. C

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to install and work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these units to keep an eye on my 94 year old father-in-law in his home. They were easy to install and work well, even in the dark. I bought these with pan/tilt feature because I though I needed it. I admit I rarely use this feature, although I tested it and it does work well. The app works well and is installed on 2 i-phones. I miss having a version I can install on my fire TV, but I can live without this. I have not tried the alerts or recording features; so I cannot comment on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Conrad

customer_reviews.title: There are better cameras out there.
customer_reviews.text: The camera’s are nice and clear but it keeps sending me notifications on my phone when no one is at my house. It also doesn’t record when anyone is there. That was the main reason I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: We found this camera superior to other similar cameras we have tried
customer_reviews.text: We found this camera superior to other similar cameras we have tried. Was impressed with their support. We were having trouble setting up remote access and called technical support. We spoke with Dylan Russell who setup the surveillance software for us on our laptop and now it allows us to remotely access this camera. Dylan even showed up how to add addition cameras to the software. We would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good cameras but tough to setup
customer_reviews.text: The camera quality is good. However, it has a lot of configurations to be done and the setup is not that easy at all as described in the manual. I am IT expert and it took me some time to be able to access the camera outside the network.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Moawad

customer_reviews.title: Can be powered using a power bank!
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera for price. The app is good, the camera is good, and the price is good. The best part of these cameras is that it can be powered from a Powerbank. With a 20,000 mAh powerbank, I can power this for 3-4 days. The setup for me was quick and easy as I work into the IT field.
customer_reviews.author: Fats

customer_reviews.title: The best security cam ever...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these cameras, 2 in the USA and 1 in Canada. They work perfectly and I would highly recommend. I have easy access from my iPhone, iPad, and desktop computer. Plus, their tech support is amazing. Had a problem today because I changed my network and Amanda helped me get everything back up and working. She was knowledgeable, patient, and very professional. Very impressed with Amanda.
customer_reviews.author: Gerronimo

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras - We've already caught someone steal a plant off of our porch AND our dogs give a dead bird a tour of our house while we were gone at work. Image is great, the TPZ is a wonderful feature and peace of mind is amazing. My husband DID say there are many more options/settings than we will probably ever need and the software did take a little brain power to get up and working, but overall, great cameras.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderKate

customer_reviews.title: difficult remote access to setup
customer_reviews.text: image quality 5 star, function 5 star, but 1 star for ease of access outside of local network. Despite being able to do the port forwarding of my 4 Foscam cameras in a matter of minutes I have been unable to portforward my two Amrest. Cameras are visible on the local wifi, and are visible remotely with the Amcrest app but have been unable to see the cameras remotely on my tinycam application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - good view
customer_reviews.text: Great camera - good view, super easy to set up. Gives us a sense of calm that we can watch the nanny with our son while we are at work. Also, great night mode - awesome detailed view, beats any baby monitor hands down. Only suggestion I would make is to make the cord longer - it's about 8-9 feet long and if you mount the camera closer to the ceiling, it is a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: odessit40

customer_reviews.title: An OK product but to expensive for what it can do.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work OK But don't try to get help on the phone because you'll get someone from some other country. I have these cameras for over two months now and I still can't get any help on getting them to record 24/7. I have left my cell # and my email and I'm still waiting on their help. I would not recommend buying them. In fact I just bought an 8 camera system and I went with auto pair which I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad software
customer_reviews.text: Hardware seems good, however the software does not work. The config tool on the CD did not work at all. I downloaded a new version which started, however it requires a plugin and that plugin has not been updated since the new security requirements required by the various browsers went into effect. They had about 2 years notice to update these plugins and did not do it. So don't expect to be able to configure or view your camera using windows. I do not have a smart phone, so for me there usefulness is very limited. They will have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to configure
customer_reviews.text: 1. Wireless config doesn't work. Phone emits beeps but camera doesn't respond. 2. Tried Wired Ethernet config; that seemed to work (although certain screens provide info requests that can't be entered [see photo] - WiFi network - why ask for this again when you've asked for it—and I've provided it—earlier in the process??) but disconnecting from cable rendered the camera unusable. 3. Used web interface (Chrome with Amcrest's required Extension) and this provided nothing substantive. Very disappointing. I'll note I already have webcams set up and do tech support for a living. The cameras may be okay but the software bites. If you can't configure the cameras, it's worthless junk.
customer_reviews.author: B. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Feeling safer already
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a breeze and the cameras were up and running in under 15 minutes. The picture is clear and the night vision works great. The only thing that stops me from giving this product 5 out of 5 is the speaker feature. I went outside and tried to talk to my son through the mic, but I couldn't hear him (yes, the speaker and mic were on) and he told me that he couldn't make out what I was saying as it sounded all broken up. If I can figure out how to fix this problem I will definitely update my review. On a whole though, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pauline felizardo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: easy installation: 1. Download app 2. Power on 3. Connect to home WiFi 4. Attach to ceiling or wall 5. Enjoy The app is easy to use and has all features I need. You can even talk to people on the other side via your smart phone although they cannot see you. Some minor issues: I do see the live video is lagging if I switch to HD while my wife is watching YouTube. I may need to upgrade my wireless router to fix it. I am currently using AirPort Extreme 5th generation which should have ~400mbps bandwidth
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: We highly recommend this camera
customer_reviews.text: For an easy to setup and use camera for home, office or shop we can highly recommend the Amcrest ProHD.. Good clarity. We use these cameras to watch our home and office when away and have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Leland Darryl Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to replace some older lower resolution cameras from a different manufacturer. Just as a test. The thing I really liked about the old cameras was the multiple motion detection zones, but they only worked with IE 11. No updates any longer, that's a shame but totally understandable. Can't get EPROM updates for '91 Rivieras either - technology wise, this was equivalent. These cameras are great! I ordered 4 more to replace some other older cameras. Easy to configure - i used the web interface from my computer, had no issues. I don't understand trying to do everything from a phone, that's just stupid. Apple fan boys...
customer_reviews.author: mx229

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but good for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about 5 of these for various projects. 3 of them got returned to me, and ended up using them my self. I have one propped on a desk, and connected to a recording device (NVR). Because ONVIF is the protocol used, it links up very easily with most NVR's and even some DVR's as well. Not the best, but it does its job. IR sucks, but it works. Picture quality does stream at 1080p so thats definitely a plus. You can also use this as a standalone device, without a need for a seperate recorder. That can also be accessed through their amcrest app. Connectivity comes by way of wifi, or ethernet connection (or both).
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: He is so helpful to make everything work beautifully. The picture of the camera is so clear
customer_reviews.text: The support person Cliff Hoyer is very knowledgeable about the product, very patient, walk me thru the installation step by step. It is difficult because I have cameras in two different houses and I want to use only one application to see both places so the cameras have to be reset. He is so helpful to make everything work beautifully. The picture of the camera is so clear, so sharp, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Network install
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras! They pan 360 degrees and tilt 90 degrees. Record storage on SD card up to 64 GB. Great phone in tech support. Nelson was helpful in setting up my PC software and SD cards. Highly recommend this product and service!
customer_reviews.author: Professor Fether

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little added piece of mind.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to set up on my Andriod phone but easy on the computer. E-mail alerts come directly to my phone anyway. Nice clear pictures day or night (B&W). Would recommend these to anyone who has a little of tech knowledge or help available.
customer_reviews.author: tguth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality cameras for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have six cameras around my house for security, three indoor and three outdoor. This twin pack had one camera that was out of focus (fixed focus). Amcrest replaced the faulty camera through their RMA process. All six of the cameras produce excellent quality daylight and night vision images. Integration with the Amcrest View Pro App is very easy to set up and provides more than adequate functionality. I love these cameras, excellent quality and great value for money. Setup is completely wireless and pretty straightforward if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Not fun. Frustrating to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Set up sucked so badly that I wish I never purchased these. It is not user friendly and you can't access most of the functions from your phone so there is this huge ordeal with setup because of this. It is terrible terrible system. I am still not really wanting to use it. I wish I bought something else because I spent so much money and I don't trust the company now either. It seems very fishy and it may have slowed my computer way down and my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, not compatible with many programs.
customer_reviews.text: Camera has very good resolution. Setup is a nightmare if you use the Amcrest program. It will not broadcast sound over programs I can find. Again, good camera, but I wouldn't buy it again until Amcrest smooths out the interface. After dealing with Amcrest crappy camera interfaces, and the camera's inability to make a connection with the good software, it's simple. Never, never again
customer_reviews.author: virgil

customer_reviews.title: Affordable with Great Video Qualtiy
customer_reviews.text: It's so difficult to find a good and inexpensive security camera on the internet that works great. The Amcrest ProHD camera exceeded all of my expectations. The camera provides excellent video quality, easy-to-use features, and of course, the pan and tilt option. It gives me a peace of mind that when I am at work I cycle through my 2 cameras and view every angle of the room. I would highly recommend this camera if you need one that is less expensive and great quality. The only reason I gave this review 5 stars is because the app is a bit confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Latimer

customer_reviews.title: No Safari 12 compatibility
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are very easy to set up and use with the app. They are a little more difficult to set up with a NAS. However, a little time on google and I was recording to my network drive. Be careful of your setting though. The recordings don’t take very long to consume 1t of space. Overall it’s a decent system for the price. One major problem I ran into is that the live view does not work with MacOS Safari 12. From what I’ve read, there are no solutions to resolve this issue. The mobile app works fine on the latest version of iOS.
customer_reviews.author: WhyLableMe

customer_reviews.title: They like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and son-in-law so they could monitor their home. My daughter is a new mother. She works at night, but she can check in and see her baby and husband when she feels the need. She's told me more than once that she's glad I got them for her. I don't know if they have the second one in use or not. I plan to get some for my self in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon Pain (HP)

customer_reviews.title: This is the worse ip-camera I have never have
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 IP2M-841B IP cameras for 2 yrs. They both disconnect and reconnect every 5~10 minutes since last yr. I have watched Amcrest trouble shooting video and it does not help on my problem. If the videos shows true issue, why another brand of ip cameras do not have this problem? Amcrest, you should face to your failure and repair your ip-camera instead of finding more excuses. This is the worse ip-camera I have never have.
customer_reviews.author: Gin Yuan Sheh

customer_reviews.title: ... most helpful in resolving ALL my questions about you wonderful product. I have several amcrest cameras in 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Cliff Hoyer was most helpful in resolving ALL my questions about you wonderful product. I have several amcrest cameras in 2 homes and they make security perfect. thank you for producing such great products. The tech support was quick to respond and extremely knowledgeable about the products. thank you so much for making ip cam surveillance so easy.
customer_reviews.author: gabbiano

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time cameras worked as they should. I have purchased several others that were delegated to the useless drawer after they either failed to mee expectations or were ridiculous to program. Right out of the box both cameras initialized using wifi without any problems. I can easily view the cameras on my cell phone whether I'm home or traveling. I am very pleased with the exception of one thing. I wish there was a simple way to turn the cameras on/off when I don't want them on.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader62

customer_reviews.title: No luck with Amazon Warehouse deals lately.
customer_reviews.text: Love these cameras... I own 2... I decided to buy 2 more and made the mistake of ordering through Amazon Warehouse deals. Both looked great but neither worked. One had a problem with the factory password and no way to factory reset the other connected but only showed black screen. I guess the only way to buy these cameras are directly from the source without cutting corners.
customer_reviews.author: Kellythebartender

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to Amcrest I can now keep an eye on my home from anywhere in the world, right from my smartphone. The audio and video quality is excellent!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorExplorer

customer_reviews.title: App total pain to use
customer_reviews.text: The app is bad. Never did get schedule settings to work. This my 2nd time with Amcrest and had trouble in both cases . The cameras may be good if you could get app to work better.
customer_reviews.author: tldoor

customer_reviews.title: Cameras/App Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to get these 2 cameras functioning for over 2 weeks now to no avail. I have downloaded and deleted the app multiple times and it still doesn't work. I don't know if its the cameras themselves or the app, but either way it doesn't work. I had one of these before and loved it, and my 2 year old yanked the cord and broke it that is why I ordered these two. Its unfortunate. I am guessing with the new updates to the app a lot of people are having issues with their cameras. It needs to be fixed asap.
customer_reviews.author: O.I.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, easy to set up and use the App.
customer_reviews.text: These complete 3rd set. Wish these could be outdoor rated, so need some around house. Easy to set up, great picture quality and for the price, awesome. App on phone and tablet works great. Be smart and make strong password so dummies cant hack your cameras. Don’t leave the default, for one they make you change it, but don’t keep it simple.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Cloud web interface is really old and glitchy. Don't go for it
customer_reviews.text: The cloud interface is really bad. First they only really support Internet Explorer. Second, downloaded video does not have any timestamp! so how are you supposed to know from what time the video you downloaded is? Third, videos are only 30 seconds long, so if you want to look at 30 minutes of video, you need 60 downloads!!! What crap is this?
customer_reviews.author: Yaron Cohen

customer_reviews.title: These cameras were a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: We bought these a few days before we left on an extended vacation. We were so worried about our pets at home. it was an easy set up. They worked perfect. If it wasn't for these cameras we never would've been able to stay away as long as we did. They set our minds at ease, as we were gone looking in on our animals and watching the caretakers come in and take care of them and watching them interact and be safe while we were gone. We love them and recommend them to anyone and everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P. Rosal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I've had nothing but problems! They keep resetting and spinning around all by themselves... this is my second order hoping that maybe they've gotten better, but they haven't... My recommendation is, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: NicMon

customer_reviews.title: Not a Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: I gave Amcrest a number of chances to make things right and now it's time for my review. The cameras themselves are fine however the software is terrible, the youtube videos on their account are not very useful and out of date which leaves you to have to call them and possibly get some help and then maybe not. The most significant thing for me was that one of the cameras is faulty (it won't tilt vertically) and it's still under warranty however I have to pay $45 for shipping of mine and the replacement one....kind of silly for a $62 camera. The only reason why they work well is because I am using third party camera software
customer_reviews.author: Norm L Lachance

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is good at 1280x720 which is sufficient for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Almost brainless to setup. Couldn't be easier. User friendly android app. Works well in Chrome on Windows 10 as well. Most importantly, this tied into my NAS, a Synology 718+ with Surveillance Station. Although not officially listed as compatible, it came online and began recording immediately after entering the IP of the cameras. Video quality is good at 1280x720 which is sufficient for my needs. Recording at this resolution is taking 284MB for 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: USGezr

customer_reviews.title: Awsome produdut & first rate customer service
customer_reviews.text: This camera is sleek and great video recording. I had trouble when I first purchased my device getting it connected to my wireless network and phone. I called customer support and Raymond Hayes was so knowledgeable and set everything up for me so it is now working like a top. He helped explain how to use the setting for turning on and off recordings. I cannot recommend this product and company and product enough. I will be buying further products from Amcrest in the future for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE SCAM PRODUCT DOESN’T WORK
customer_reviews.text: Worst company ever beware they are a scam. Customer service doesn’t call you back an doesn’t know how to install there own product. I’ve been trying for weeks to figure out how to set up. I figured out after 6 failed attempts. Company said there software was outdated an put a new one in the App Store. WHAT THEY DON’T TELL YOU IS THAT FOR VIDEO PLAYBACK YOU NEED AN SD CARD AN CAN ONLY SET UP WITH A WINDOWS BASED PC . UNBELIEVABLE!!!!! BUYER BEWARE AMAZON BETTER STAND BEHIND MY RETURN ON THIS GARBAGE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Tech support is great and easy to contact
customer_reviews.text: Recently lost the ability to get e-mail notifications when the camera detected an event. I was not able to get the firmware updated by myself so I contacted support. A few emails resulted in the matter being log back to a support person who after looking at the matter scheduled a phone support date that I requested. Janice Thomas contacted me and worked through the firmware updates and fixed the email issues. She was great to work with and Amcrest is a great company.
customer_reviews.author: gale h.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value, but is somewhat cheap made
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Although the PTZ doesn’t work in the one and the power adapter is very touchy because something is wrong with the port to wear it just stops working completely and you have mess with it time to time. The one I have in my room works fantastic and great, I love it but the other one is packed away in my garage because it’s more of a hassle to use them to rely on or even mess with. Compared to the one that I depend on that works fully, Love it definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Schenk

customer_reviews.title: These don't work after just a couple month
customer_reviews.text: Seemed great, but now they dont function at all. They show online, but do not stream any video. Support has yet to respond. Terrible purchase! Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris Bueller

customer_reviews.title: lose power lose Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: Lost power, lost Wi-Fi connection to cameras, have to remove cameras from building and reconnect to the router to re-setup. big inconvenience. do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cloud service will reset camera settings to default every 24 hours...
customer_reviews.text: Noticed that when adding camera to cloud service, that the settings on the camera itself resets to default every 24 hours. It seems to hold the settings when removing the camera off the cloud all together. That defeats the whole purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Pancakes

customer_reviews.title: Amcrest cameras and tech support are top notch
customer_reviews.text: Dominic Parker was the tech at Amcrest who provided outstanding support when I could not reconfigure one of my cameras to operate wirelessly. He was able to reconfigure my camera in less than 5 minutes. I will purchase Amcrest cameras when I need more in the future. I have 4 of their 1080p cameras and could not be happier. Video and sound are excellent for cameras in their price range. Their tech support and cameras rate a 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Ira Dunav

customer_reviews.title: Great product for today and future use!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby monitor went out and I didn't want to purchase a new one so we got these cameras after friend's recommended them. I am very happy with eh product and how they work, the only thing that should change is teh app shoudl be updated slightly. Aside from that no complaints and I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Howard

customer_reviews.title: One camera in 2-pack was DOA
customer_reviews.text: One of the two cameras ordered works just fine and I was able to set-up and configure. The other camera will not connect through Wi-Fi despite hard-resetting the camera itself. My current router and modem will not allow for an Ethernet-Wifi connection as it doesn't have the required ports to do so. I'll have to return the good camera with the bad one now because they were purchased as a set.
customer_reviews.author: dustin t wintczak

customer_reviews.title: Good product and service but NO digital Zoom function.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving only 3 star even though the product itself and customer service deserve 5 stars because the product description was WRONG. "digital zoom" is not available since this particular model # "IP2M-841W-V3" has a fixed lense. I finger pinching on a viewing screen doesn't work, I also could not find digital zoom function in the configuration app via computer. I have two earlier version with Model #"IP2M-841W" that works awesome on all fronts. Customer service representatives, Samantha, was a great help, so she deserves a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jun S. Shin

customer_reviews.title: Clear Picture, easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I have had other security cameras (Guardzilla), these are the easiest to install takes less than 2 minutes. Clear pictures. I would highly recommend for anyone who is looking for easy at a reasonable price for wi-fi cameras Can be hidden easily and still get great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Yundt

customer_reviews.title: horrible software
customer_reviews.text: don't buy this one of the cameras worked without issue another keeps switching between day and night mode making a creepy ticking sound in my house. support has been slow to handle the issue. They want me to update firmware, but their firmware update doesn't even work. That is how terrible their software is. Wish I could undo this purchase and get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Price, quality and tech support is the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought these cameras 4 years ago, I replaced my router and had to reconfigure all 4 cameras. The tech support from Amcrest was brilliant. The Amcrest rep, Stacy G, stayed with me on the phone for close to 2 hours as we reset each camera and got them back online. I was very impressed and I am a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: La Chula

customer_reviews.title: Never make mistake. These are not security cameras
customer_reviews.text: These products suck. When electricity cut, they can not be connected. You need to unplug and plug in. This means this not a security camera at all. Not trust them. Their customer service also very bad. They replaced my products with a refurbished products and one of the camera never worked at all. They can not find a solution but not accept their fault either. Go and buy a good camera. Ring is million times better than these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: On the Phone Tech Help
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 cameras a year or 2 ago, they worked fine until I got a new phone, then they were a bit off, I messed with them for a bit, got one working correctly, but couldn't get the other one to work perfectly (it still worked, I just couldn't click on the Motion Alert & see the video, I probably screwed something up) I called Amcrest, someone tried to help but couldn't get it right, so she scheduled a call back for the next morning, and Colin Peters called me back (He said he might get credit if I mentioned him) and was able to figure it out in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cameras for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband did the review already but that was before we tried the product. You need customer support help to get it started and once set up it’s easy to use cameras and these two pictures show night and day vision. I will add one closer as zoom is not the best for details. Overall I recommend this product and the price is reasonable for two cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Ela Berbic

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great features. Nothing to complain about so far. Would recommend to friends and family looking to get an affordable high quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: For the first three months this was absolutely awesome! Then it suddenly would write corrupted files to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the first three months this was absolutely awesome! Then it suddenly would write corrupted files to my NAS (was flawless before) and was putting all kinds of traffic on my network (used wireshark to find that). Naturally, it's out of warranty now and beyond the return date. I'm now hooking up the second camera because I need to get this system back up. But I'll be looking for a different model for sure. Probably give the second one to my daughter to watch her dog after I get a different model. Was hoping it would last, had great video night and day while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Danny G

customer_reviews.title: Cameras have been great. Video quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Cameras have been great. Video quality is excellent. Slightly bulkier than some other cams but I love being able to rotate the camera side to side to get more of a view. Now that Firefox has disabled live viewing of cams, you have to use Internet Explorer or download a viewer for desktop/laptop. Support is helpful if you have any setup issues. I spoke with Dominic Parker and he was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: bowfinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product support
customer_reviews.text: Called for assistance with first installation, and support staff talked me through the installation process. There are some software bugs that are confusing, but support staff helped to get two cameras installed with wifi viewing. Then we moved and had to delete the original install, and re-install on a different network. Patrick Spencer provided excellent support to assist in re-installing the two cameras. They work great now. We find these cameras extremely useful in monitoring our 102 and 103 year old parents.
customer_reviews.author: William K Hilarides

customer_reviews.title: 50% work less than a year owned, barely touched
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. The PTZ is nice. Had the products less that a year and already 1 is extremely hot and no longer works. Any manufacturer warrenty on these things when they just stop working on there on? I dont check in on my cameras often, they are there for emergency but recently when i went to make sure everything is up to par (it has been months since i checked) only 1 of the 2 work. Help please.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Support I have been using this camera for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with customer service I got from the technician Cliff Hoyer. He was so patient and polite. Great Support I have been using this camera for a while, so far so good. worked perfectly with my Phone and computer. motion detection works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bill_Ben

customer_reviews.title: once you get the hang of the web ui they work great. I use my NAS as an FTP server ...
customer_reviews.text: These were to add-on to my other 2 ProHD cameras, once you get the hang of the web ui they work great. I use my NAS as an FTP server for them to record to and haven't had any issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: OMGWTFBBQ

customer_reviews.title: Andrea S very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Andrea S. has been extremely helpful with an issue I had with the camera. She stayed on line with me until my issue was resolved. I would recommend Amcrest products because of people like Andrea. Thank you. Stacy was extremely knowledgeable and very helpful. I would recommend buying Amcrest because of the quality of the camera and the very helpful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Video for home/small business
customer_reviews.text: Great product with fairly easy setup. The phone app that you can download to view the camera(s) while away is a plus. While there are better models of web/video monitor camera out there, this meets a fair balance between price, use, and features. The shipment arrived on time, in excellent packing and condition.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Sarges

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cameras!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are really good! If you want excellent picture viewing, sound, quality, easy set up, these are for you! I bought 4 and now I want more!! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alison S. Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Setup wasn't complicated
customer_reviews.text: Setting up was fairly easy. I couldn't get it to work via wireless setup but once I connected manually via the router it was easy. So far love the product. I bought it to keep an eye on my 16.5 year old pomeranian who has started having seizures while I am work. I wouldn't have been able to focus at work without the peace of mind knowing I can look in on her often. I like it so much that I just ordered another camera and at some point may buy more. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R Howard

customer_reviews.title: Camera is GREAT and Economical!!!!  AMCREST Customer Support fantastic!!!! Danny P 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Danny was fabulous to work with. Very Patient . Knows his stuff. As did every other tech support person at Foscam. This is my 7th camera at 3 locations. Each time my experience with Amcrest tech support was great. Thank you Danny and Amcrest. ( note I replaced my existing Foscam Cameras with Amcrest due to Foscam's inability to service the existing camera. I would never recommend Foscam. Go with the best, Amcrest.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great security cameras with HD and motion detection!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and wonderful tech support! They should work out of the box but you know you will need to reset and reconfigure! Lots of features well work the price and great app to monitor your place when your not home!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis J. Ohl

customer_reviews.title: Great Cameras
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these cameras about two years ago and ended up needing another a few months later. As of now we have 4 and they work great. They are all ceiling mounted and have good range and movement. The app works well and gives lots of options. Motion detection works good and setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: colliche22

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much I bought another 2-pak this week ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2-pak aroiund 3 weeks ago and with Amcrest Tech support had them up and running in no time.I liked them so much I bought another 2-pak this week and with the help of Amcrest Tech support agent James Clarke, he was very patient with me and explained everything he was doing, I've used tech supports before and most were lacking but these guys were absolutely on top of things,no waited time. These cameras are crisp and react on time. Their night view was impressive and didn't miss a beat for my use. Now I'm no ways thru all their programs but so far their tops,
customer_reviews.author: bigdoggy

customer_reviews.title: Image issues
customer_reviews.text: It took forever for my streaming images to load....like 2-3 minutes. After they loaded, I had a 50% chance of the image completely freezing and I would have to load again. The set up was not smooth and I consider myself technically savvy. Returning and purchasing more of the other brand that I had previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Picture frozen and not live.
customer_reviews.text: I have an Android device in several rooms to monitor my cameras. I have several brands that vary in quality. These cameras are the worst of the lot. Got quick response to support email, but suggestions were useless. Picture is frozen and not live unless a manual refresh is forced. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Tech help from Andrea S
customer_reviews.text: These camera's were set up in 2018, but somewhere along the way they stopped transmitting. I spent time checking and updating router equipment, and needed to reset and get the camera's back online. After unsuccessfully able to use instructions, I was facing many roadblocks. On a 1:30 hour session she was able to get me the software I needed for my computer, had me reset 1 camera and got it back online with wifi. Andrea S was very knowledgable, kind, and was patient with me. The connection was spotty and I needed to have her repeat many times. I'm not a tech newbee, but I needed help. Thank you Andrea.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia McKee

customer_reviews.title: Picture and sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Cameras are good to see what’s going on. Can record with SD card. Picture is clear as is sound. Only thing I’m bummed about is I was under the impression I could talk through the cameras and you cannot.
customer_reviews.author: MelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tech Edrian is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I love the cameras I have 4 now And call tech support to helping me EDRIAN HELP ME, he is very kind, very professional. Made me so happy Thanks Edrian
customer_reviews.author: Omar Jor-el

customer_reviews.title: These are the best cameras I use them to keep and eye on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cameras I use them to keep and eye on the kids when there playing all alone this way they can't lie to me when something goes wrong. thanks Amcrest for helping me set them up would not be able to do it without you.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific picture and sound. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 older versions of these that are approx 18 months old. These are amazing the picture is so clear in HD. I will be adding a couple more for sure. Setup is easy enough the instructions are quite clear. 20 min each one and that includes picking the location to plae.it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: After 1.5 hours and numerous try's I got it working, for a while, It keeps loosing connection. not very reliable. I really wanted it to work, The short time it worked, the picture was good ...the specs look good. I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Carl Duell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these things. The mobile app makes it really easy to keep an eye on things or get immediate motion alerts.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal. Full 1080p, and you can easily set up motion alerts to your phone. The ability to utilize the 2 way voice while someone is at your door, is amazing. Although these are not outdoor camera's, I have one outside, under the awning and have had no issues, even in 117 degree desert weather.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Abject failure
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. I spent 2 hours trying to get these to work a couple weeks ago. I tried again today and finally called customer support. After 2 calls and over 2 more hours still no go. I will give the reps credit that they did try. They had me reset both of the cameras and delete and reinstall their App using WIFI and then Ethernet twice each with no success. Their final answer is that my internet is too slow. Hello, I have FIOS 75/75 so I doubt that's the issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Amcrest camera
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. Cameras work ok, Android app works ok. I just have one problem, I can't get the motion detection to work and send me push notifications with images. I basically use it to keep an eye on my children when they are on the play room. I haven't used it as a "security" camera yet because of the motion detection issue I have.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gdo

customer_reviews.title: Cameras are great!  Apps suck!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints on the cameras at all. They’re a great deal for the price but the apps suck. If I knew how to do all the back end programming on up addresses, gateways.. ports and stuff I’d ditch their apps
customer_reviews.author: James D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras and great technical support!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cameras to add to my home security. I initially had an issue when disconnecting my mobile device from the wifi network, my camera would no longer work but I reached out to Amcrest technical support and Henry L. did an amazing job walking me through the setup of making the cameras wireless instead of relying on a wire. He also showed me a couple of laptop amcrest apps that are really helpful. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jknight

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection and support is the only reason the product gets two stars. The night vision is terrible the old Foscam I had the night vision illuminated the whole room. The cameras are in black and white half the time. Support says you have to log in via laptop to fix that. Not happy but will work till we buy our new house in a few months .Then trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but they did removed the real Zoom feature compared to the first generation of these cameras.. now you have to pinch the screen to zoom in on image. Still would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bensquared

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use these in 2 homes and Love them. I have very few losses of WiFi connectivity, can control them from away , get motion detection notices and never have I had a complaint. I own 8 Amcrest cameras which are in service now and a few other brands, which I replaced with these. A MUST BUY.
customer_reviews.author: W3BY

product_meta.title: Amcrest 2-Pack 1080p WiFi Camera Indoor, 2MP Pan/Tilt Home Security Camera, Auto-Tracking, Motion & Audio Detection, Enhanced Browser Compatibility, H.265, Two-Way Talk 2PACK-IP2M-841B-V3 (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackAMCREST MODEL: 2PACK-IP2M-841B-V3 

CAMERA FEATURES: 

Amazing real-time true-HD 1080P (1920x1080p) @ 30fps with enhanced low light capability. Superior low-light performance enabled by industry leading CMOS image sensor and chipset. Extra-Wide 90° viewing angle. Night Vision up to 32 feet with built-in IR LEDs and CMOS 1/2.7” 2MP image sensor. Two-way audio so you can talk and listen. 360° Pan & 90° Tilt. Dual Video Compression: H.265 / H.264.Playback and record professionally on a PC using Amcrest Surveillance Pro for Windows and MAC (included) or Blue Iris Professional. Also records via AmcrestCloud remote video storage, MicroSD up to 256GB (Class 10 or higher), Amcrest NVRs, Synology and QNAP NAS, and FTP. Works with Amcrest Cloud remote video storage, MicroSD card, Amcrest NVRs, Synology and QNAP NAS, FTP, Most Mainstream Web Browsers Including; Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Safari. Live view, playback, receive notifications and communicate from your smartphone with the Amcrest View Pro and AmcrestCloud apps for iOS and Android. Features a secure SSL/HTTPS connection, wireless AES/WPA2 encryption, FCC and UL camera certificate and UL compliant power supply. Supports 2.4 Ghz networks only, does not support 5 Ghz networks. Dome Dimensions: 4 x 3.9 x 4.5 inches. Dome Weight: 0.6 lbs. 

PACKAGE INCLUDES: 
2 x Amcrest ProHD 2MP Indoor Wireless Security Camera Black (IP2M-841B-V3). 2 x 5V MicroUSB Power Supply Black. 2 x Cat5 Ethernet Cable. 2 x Mount Black. Quick Start Guide. 1 Year Warranty from Amcrest.
feature_bullets: REAL-TIME, MAGNIFICENT FULL-HD DAY OR NIGHT – Experience magnificent full-HD 1080P video at 30fps with enhanced low light capability utilizing the latest CMOS 1/2.7" 2MP image sensor and chipset. An Extra-wide 90° viewing angle, as well as remote pan/tilt and digital zoom, allow you to cover more ground and keep more of what matters to you safe. Works with Alexa through Amcrest Cloud. Built-in IR LEDs this WiFi camera achieves industry-leading 1080P night vision up to 32 feet.

AUTO-TRACKING, AUDIO DETECTION, PRIVACY MODE – Receive intelligent email and push notification alerts anytime motion or audio is detected using the new audio detection feature. Communicate with your kids, pets and loved ones using the two-way talk feature via the Amcrest View Pro app. Automatically track and record moving objects by turning on Auto-Tracking Mode. Enable Privacy Mode to turn off live-view, recordings, and alerts, giving you privacy when you need it.

FLEXIBLE STORAGE AND VIEWING OPTIONS - Amcrest offers flexible security where you need it. Record directly to a 256GB MicroSD card (Sold Separately), Amcrest Cloud, Amcrest NVRs, Synology and QNAP NAS, FTP. Live-View from Most Mainstream Web Browsers Including; Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Safari. Playback and record professionally on a PC using Amcrest Surveillance Pro for Windows and MAC (included) or Blue Iris Professional (Sold Separately).

SECURE CLOUD VIDEO BACKUP – The optional Amcrest Cloud remote video storage subscription service allows you to automatically store your videos off-site in a third-party location hosted and secured by Amazon AWS. This way if something happens to your local PC/NVR/SDcard/NAS, the footage will be safely recorded in a secure off-site location and accessible to you through a web-based Flash interface for PC (Windows & MAC) (Chrome/Firefox/Safari/Edge) and AmcrestCloud smartphone app.

SIMPLE. RELIABLE. SECURE. - This Amcrest 2.4ghz wireless camera features a secure SSL/HTTPS connection, wireless AES/WPA2 encryption, FCC and UL camera certificate, and receives regular security firmware updates (Does Not Support 5ghz). At Amcrest, we want to ensure the safety of our customers, their loved ones, homes, and businesses and you’ll receive a full 1-year US Warranty and Lifetime Support provided directly from Amcrest.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,185 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
